name: Rigid Bond
description:
A puzzle game where you control two pieces bound together by a... you guessed it! rigid bond.

The game has 27 free levels for you to experience. If you choose to pay a small fee you can play the rest of the levels. They are 75 in total.

There are different color themes that you can unlock by playing. They are given as rewards for completing worlds and for getting perfect scores!

This is a solo project except for the in-game music! It started as a pen and paper prototype years ago and it's finally time to put it out to the world!

The game is in English and it is also localized in :

  • Arabic
  • German

I might need to check the German translation because it was all from Google Translate, so if you can speak German and you find something that doesn't make sense please let me know!

In-game music composed by: Moussa

Starting from February 14th, 2022, the game will be available to download on the google play store! It is a free game with ads and an one time payment option to stop the ads and get more levels and skins! 

Also, a very special thanks to Rami Ismail for game design advice!
